I want to make a suggestion. Not a critique of anyone or anything. We all have a tendency to get a little off-topic at times. Can I suggest, at least in the private channels, we try our best not to derail threads made for specific reasons. If something in a niche thread provokes something you want to talk about further, can we please forward it to another channel like this or ‚Å†break-room to have those side discussions? I have a lot of fun in here with ya'll and like ya'll. I'm just a geek for structure. And while I've probably read everything ever written in this server anyway. In certain cases like specific threads it would be nice if we kept those conversations related to the purpose of the thread, so it's easier to follow, or catch-up, or refer to later. ‚úåÔ∏è
